A_exclusive.point: Kind-hearted and proactive, A is quick to notice the discomfort of others and is always ready to lend a helping hand.
Approaches the elderly person first and offers assistance, then turns to B to coordinate the effort of finding an available seat.
To ensure the senior citizen is comfortably seated and to demonstrate a sense of community responsibility.
A regularly uses public transport and has a habit of being vigilant about the needs of fellow passengers, often initiating small acts of kindness.

B_exclusive.point: Sensitive and cooperative, B is not as quick to act but is responsive to the needs of others and willing to collaborate.
Joins A in the effort to help the senior, scanning the bus for an empty seat and signaling to A when one becomes available.
To work together with A to help the senior and to foster a sense of community spirit on the journey.
B values community service and sees this opportunity as a chance to practice empathy and cooperation in a real-life situation.
